paper_metadata.title: Case study of poverty alleviation through agricultural development in Changshun County

program_information.target_population: Impoverished farmers in rocky desertification areas

component_a_cash_support.cash_evidence_citation: During the past three years, the county has offered us an annual subsidy of 239 yuan per mu, in accordance with the compensatory standard for people returning their farmland to forest or grass land

component_b_assets.assets_evidence_citation: The government has offered us baby chicks free of charge, and given us technical guidance and subsidy for mending chicken cottages

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: According to statistics, in 2012, farmers in Changshun County received an average income of 5,161 yuan, almost doubling the figures of 2,652 yuan in 2008... With 15,000 people getting out of poverty, the county completed the herculean task of poverty reduction in 2012
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: The paper presents a detailed case study of agricultural development and poverty reduction in Changshun County

bonus_information.qualitative_evidence_citation: Multiple direct quotes and stories from beneficiaries like Liang Zhongxiang and Wang Mingchao are presented throughout the paper

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Changshun County has, driven by new development philosophy, launched a new round of poverty relief and development
evidence_citations.country_citation: Changshun County, as one of the key counties for our country's new-stage poverty relief and development
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Areas with rocky desertification cover 77.9% of the whole county area... Changshun County has a high level of poverty with poverty exists over a wide geographical area
